entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean repository build results in: AsnXml regenerated files, be sure to check them in #101651
  • `pal.h` will not build with clang 18 for x86 #101639
  • AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames_Get_ReturnsExpected_HybridGlobalization failing with string mismatch #101634
    9.0.0

Closed

  • ConcurrentBag IndexOutOfRangeException when using ToImmutableArray() #101641
  • [WASM] Issues with callback parameters marshaling #101637
  • Sigsegv when calling a virtual method via UnsafeAccessor #101643
    9.0.0
  • UWP App on Release stop function when it starts using the System.Text.Json on version 4.7.0 #978
    Future
  • Cannot inject HTTPClient into an IHostedService using HTTPClientFactory #101561
  • [mono] Intrinsify API's in SpanHelpers.ByteMemOps.cs #99161
    9.0.0
  • <Label Text="Hello, .NET MAUI!" Style="{StaticResource Headline}" SemanticProperties.HeadingLevel="Level1" /> #101635
  • Process should have a TryGetProcessById method #27411
    Future
  • start_here #101636

PullRequests

Created

  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • Fix x86 build with clang-18 #101650
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove dead code in PGO scenarios. #101649
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Move internal reserved registers to a side table #101647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Revert "Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces (#95830)" #101644
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove dead code in PGO scenarios. #101648
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Intrinsify SpanHelper API's #101622
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [WASM] Fix third parameter marshaling on callbacks #101638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-preview4] Revert "Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces (#95830)" #101645
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Fix FEATURE_MULTIREG_RETURN definition #101642
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Disable interp pgo recording by default since it adds startup overhead #101566
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Allow JIT to know if dynamic pgo is active #101575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Add support for non-generic method instance #101442
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Update build to `net9.0` images #101630
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Testing] Backport #92296 and #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101627
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • With system brotli, do not use versioned symbols #101576
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement divide/multiply/subtract Math APIs #101578
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only warn on duplicate members within a single descriptors file #101574
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #73252
    17.11
  • Formatter doesn't increase ident in multiline list patterns correctly #73251
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve processing in FindRefs #73253
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Refactor searching and reporting results in navto. #73249
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issues with pull diagnostics in VSCode #73248
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement analyzer/fixer: remove unnecessary `Call` keyword from `Call` statement #73233
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows adds a range of items to a CollectionView in reverse #22096
  • MAUI Essentials - Secure storage Legacy migration errors on some Android devices - Javax.Crypto.BadPaddingException #22094
  • OnIdiom doesn't respect Desktop setting on Windows #22093
  • Building app on github actions is not updating AndroidManifest.xml #22091

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Flyout Page support for IconImageSource #22099
    community ✨
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    community ✨

Merged

  • Enforce CA1853 performance analyzer #22092
    community ✨
  • `Microsoft.Maui-dev.sln` contains an invalid path #22033
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [android] use Java primitive `boolean` for `UriImageSource` #22040
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump $(MicrosoftMauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion) to 8.0.21 (#22066) #22088
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fixed android toolbar icon change #20166
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Improve error logging for failed resizetizering #22064
    area/single project ☝️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate for Dynamic Entity #33626
  • Recreation of unchanged foreign keys with different `DeleteBehavior` on every migration with OwnsMany relationships #33625
  • achieving join entity non-nullability semantics without startling log messages #33624
  • Use OPENJSON array element identity when it becomes available #33623
    Backlog
  • Query: element access on a collection of primitives parameter throws bad exception when run on sql server that doesn't support JSON #33621

Closed

  • GetColumnName doesn't always return the expected column name when dealing with TPH inheritance #33458
  • Can't work with multiple DbContext #33620

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Don't generate a discriminator in the snapshot if there's no discriminator property. #33622
